author: Sam M.
comment: It works great and I love using it for my work. The only thing is that the android notification bar on top of my Galaxy Note 4 doesn't vanish when using the app and therefore partially blocks some of the image. I'll gladly give 5 stars once this issue is resolved. (Also it'd be SUPER awesome if you could 'fit to width' and  have the option to scroll down for images that have a very large height compared to their width!).
title: Great App. Just one issue!

author: Rahul Chakraborty
comment: This app is really great. But I would rate it 5 stars if few minor features were added. Firstly, a width-fit support with Scrollable view is needed. Its of immense use for all Interface designers out there.  Secondly, when using artboards, the app displays all the artboards together,.. Instead of doing this, the app could display only those artboards which are active in Photoshop. This is another thing that will help people working in the latest PS CC versions alot.
title: Minor tweaks needed

author: Martijn Ruijzendaal
comment: Great app! Only thing I'm missing is a zooming functionality (not sure if possible) that also maintains zoom when edits are made on PC.  Also, the activity resets when rotating the device 90° (180° works fine). Not sure if this is intended.  Hope to see those features launch soon!

author: Omid RAD
comment: It's very usefull for me. But there is a big bug that when you want to enter ip to connect to photoshop, a numeral keyboard will be show and unfortunately there is not any Dot key to enter the ip correct! You can only enter numbers! You should copy and paste your ip here! Also it is very good if you make it scroll support. Big thanks 😊
title: Great app!

author: Tyler Yates
comment: It's a shame we need 3rd party apps in the first place. Adobe should treat all platforms equally.   I like this app, it's easy to connect, fast and responsive. The reason I am giving 3 stars is because artboards are all shown at once, meaning this app is pointless in app design with more than one screen; unless of course you want each screen as a separate PSD file.

reply.author: Waffle Ware Apps
reply.content: Adobe hasn't updated the SDK for artboards. Unfortunately nothing we can do about this.

author: Khalid Hasan Zibon
comment: I can't thank you enough for how it's helping me to design mobile apps, just one more feature request: Please add scroll view! When I am designing mobile version of websites I need to see the actual preview size. So width should fit the screen but height should be scrollable! Please add this feature in next update. Thanks. 💖  I AM WILLING TO PAY FOR IT IF SCROLL FEATURE IS ADDED
title: ✋ Updated: Please READ!!! ✋

author: Amit Saxena
comment: Its a great app for all the ui designers out there but it lacks the main thing, scrollable view of the designs especially mobile layouts. Please add this feature also try to add zoom feature. Thanks a ton for this lovely app. Would rate 5 of 5 after you update these two minor changes.
title: Must have app

author: Myra Denise Cortina
comment: Good while it lasted. It doesn't work anymore. I use PS CS6 to design and my phone is an android. I cannot find any instructions on the net to fix it. I've been inputting the right ip address and both my phone and laptop are connected to the same wifi so i don't know what the problem is.

author: Danny Raul Molina
comment: I followed instructions but it didn't connect. It says "A connection error occurred. Please check your  credentials" I can't find any information out there? Guys please let us know how to fix it

reply.author: Waffle Ware Apps
reply.content: This sometimes happens if you still have a settings screen or any pop-up (color picker, type settings,..) open in Photoshop. Does it work if you close all those?

title: Connection error

author: Prashant Tyagi
comment: I am using this app in office...there it works well and connect easily. But at home it is not connected with my laptop. After doing all the steps..it shows "Could not connect and please check connectivity settings."

author: Kevin D'Mello
comment: The app has missed out on one feature though - scrollview. It displays a tall image as a fit-to-width overview, that cannot be zoomed into.
title: A really handy tool for UI design, but..

author: Dan Frumkin
comment: Vertical works every time, but horizontal is hit or miss, working only 30% of the time, error after error. If not for that huge issues, 5 stars.

author: Jon Guerra Fernandez
comment: Ok app, when it works its amazing,, however a lot of the time, it doesn't. It just shows: blank screen with "connection established". Takes a lot of close photoshop.. re open again... close app on device... re open... and when you're just about to delete it and never use it again... it begins to work again....

author: Amna A.Razzaq
comment: Worst app ever. It takes all your time connecting to your device. Please don't waste your time on this app.

author: Cari Cheng
comment: I've used it a lot, and it's simple and easy to set up and use. However I changed my phone and now I'm stuck in the "Connection Established" screen. I don't know what to do. Please help!

author: Jo Conlon
comment: I initially couldn't get past the 'Established connection' window. I emailed the developer who got back to me straight away: "Photoshop fails to send the image if there's any kind of dialog open"  - Remote connection, settings window, color picker, text tool active etc after that no problems at all.  This app is far more reliable than Skala Preview which works about 5% of the time.  Again, if the sys bar could be hidden and scrolling enabled it would be perfect.  Thank you.
title: Reliable and fast

author: Chloe Lee
comment: It used to work perfectly now after established connection nothing showed up!!! Pls fix this problem soon life depends on it
title: Doesn't work anymore

author: Marcel Garcia
comment: Just one thing!!!! NEED TO PREVIEW ARTBOARDS, and the app is previewing the entire photoshop artboards. Need the app to focus in the active artboard! Thank you very much for everything!

author: Andrei Avram
comment: I have use this app before and works ok. Now doesn't, I just installed again and rich the point when tell me that Connection is establish and then nothing :( Can you tell me what can be the problem?

author: Usman Zahid Farooqi
comment: I like it but I want to suggest that to support artboard display and show fixed width display not fixed height. Height should be dragable. See Adobe XD app for example
title: Good idea

author: Muhammad Ihsan
comment: It just connect for the first time.  The next attempt is nothing and stuck in connection error page.  Love the working one.  Hopefully it can be normal again.

author: Tony O'Donohoe
comment: Nice app but bit of an oversight not allowing scrollview. It would be much better if designs could fit to width rather than height and thus allow scrolling. Check out Ps Play's functionality on iOS.

author: vinay kumar
comment: Great App that I've come across. will give 5 stars if it has "fit to screen & Scroll options"  Hope you come up with those features in future soon...

author: Christian Emilsson
comment: Would love scroll support, as in make the width 100% of the screen and make the hight go outside the screen. 5 stars when that works. It doesn't hide notification bar anymore with marshmallow :(
title: Clean, fast, works

author: mishan randika
comment: Fit screen option should have two options for width and height separately. So then long images can be scrollable like a real app. Hope this feature will include in later versions.
title: Great tool for designers

author: Alexander Protikhin
comment: Please fit width not height. So designer could create long screens and scroll them as real application. Ps play for IOS do so.
title: Take a look ps play for ios

author: Iosif Simon
comment: I sooooo needed this! BRILLIANT! Images not full quality but can t complain.
title: Amazing!

author: Natash Aston
comment: Not able to hide the default green status bar of the app. Rectify this, n the rest KUDOS

author: Zani Labuschagne
comment: Connects and previews 8/10 when in a PSD file where all artboards are on display (which unfortunately defeats the purpose of single screen display preview), but gives error after error when attempting to display full screen designs or single artboard PSD files.

author: YASIR Malik
comment: App is not working on my Note5. its shows Connection Established. and no more activity it stopped

author: Sam Nalty
comment: App is great, would be fantastic if it supported artboards in CC 2015 the way Adobe's new preview app for iOS does.

author: David C
comment: Brilliant app! Complete game changer for me.  I'm a photographer and it let's me see how  every editing step in photoshop  looks - instantly live on my  android phone! Wish I found it sooner! A must have.
title: Dave c

author: kev maclean
comment: Has potential but can't see past the constant crashing. Flipping the screen sometimes works. But most of the time it just either loses connection or crashes.

author: Ayush Mandloi
comment: It's crashed several time, when I do live changes on my PSD file or hide or view any layer, it's crashed. Hope you soon fixed this bug.

author: Nitish Upadhyay
comment: Adding zoom functionality wd b great..The app some time doesn't connect..wonder why..I tried clearing cache memory ..even data..still not working..I ve rechecked the remote option in Photoshop..even changing the password..doesn't seem to help...it is not working..please fix this issue...

author: Justin Collins
comment: Well...I was able to connect without a problem and pretty quickly. But until artboards and scrolling preview are supported, there's really not much you can do with it when previewing app or mobile screens.

author: Ivan Isakovic
comment: It does just what it says and it helps greatly when designing app or website for mobile. For some of the future updates, I wish it supports the artboards where i could flick the artboards left and right like in the image gallery.
title: Love it

author: Luca Francesco Rossi
comment: impossible to use airboard and scrolling functionalities: it will just show the entire artwork leaving you without the option to zoom in.
I loved this app untill it got stuck on 'connection established'. Would love to get it back to work though.

author: Olga Mikhailenko
comment: but it doesn't work. Nothing happens after establishing a connection
title: Could be a good tool,
